document.full_text: philadelphia federal reserve bank president charles plosser on friday said the u.s. central bank could move to tighten monetary policy this year if the recovery unfolds as he expects.
document.title: plosser says fed could tighten policy this year
lines_and_colors: philadelphia federal reserve bank president charles plosser on friday said the u.s. central bank could move to tighten monetary policy this year if the recovery unfolds as he expects.
